verses.text: Jab'xonhej val syal vik'an vik' svab'i. Vanxo sk'och in q'uinal d'a slajvub', vach'xo yaj ved'tal d'a campusante.
A eb' anima, oyanoch eb' in sb'uchani, masanil tiempo syak' cus in k'ol eb', maxtzac yal in colan in b'a d'a eb'.
Palta Mamin colin, yujto malaj junocxo mach syak'och sb'a in scolani, a achnhej syal uuj.
A ach ix a k'ub'ejel jelanil d'a juntzanh eb' vinh vamigo tic, manh in a cha ak'joc ganar yuj eb' vinh.
Elocab'k'och icha syal jun ab'ix: A junoc mach syixtej junoc yamigo, axo yuninal ol ab'an syail yuj jun tas sk'ulej chi'.
A ach ix ak' yal chuc eb' anima d'ayin, ix laj stzub'an in sat eb'.
Toxonhej q'uik'aminac vilan yuj in yaelal. Ichato manh chequeloc in nivanil tic, yujto ix in te b'acb'i.
Ayic syilan eb' anima vach' sb'eyb'al tas tzin ik'an tic, sat sk'ol eb', scot yoval eb', yujto chuc in snaan eb'.
A eb' vach' sb'eyb'al, vach'nhej ol elk'och eb'. A eb' malaj chucal sk'ulej, ol q'uenhejchaanh eb'.
Palta cotanhec d'a tic ex vamigo. Malaj junoc aj pensar tz'ilchaj vuj d'a e cal.
B'elb'on yek' in q'uinal, axo tas nab'il vuuj, ma tas tzin nib'ej, toxo ix juvieli.
A ex tic a d'ak'valil tzeyaloch k'ualil, axo yic q'uik'q'uinal, tzeyalani, lak'anxo ay saquilq'uinal.
Toxonhej tzin tanhvej in chami, yic sk'och telan in nivanil svay d'a cal q'uik'alq'uinal.
A nok' a'ay yed' campusante svaloch in mam in nunoc yed' vanab'oc.
多B'ajtil ay tas svak'och yipoc in k'ool? 多Ay am mach ojtannac tas ol in ajoc?
多Tom ol k'och jun chi' ved' d'a yed'tal eb' chamnac? 多Tom ol cannhej ved' ta' d'a yol lum luum chi'? xchi vinhaj Job chi'.
